alert.note: Alert for Allen; Putnam (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Putnam and northeastern Allen Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pandora, or near Gilboa. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gilboa. This includes Interstate 75 between mile markers 138 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
